Room.Name: Mordichi's Wine Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: This is a wine shop specializing in the cheaper bottles of the grape. You are below ground level in a cool and dark cellar, which belongs to Mordichi the wine merchant. If you have never tried his wares, he is quite generous and will let you sample the cask which practically fills the cellar.
Room.LongDescription: You are below ground level in a cool and dark cellar which belongs to Mordichi the wine merchant. Mordichi specializes in bottles of the cheaper variety of wines. If you wish to buy in bulk, there is a 1000 gallon cask standing in the center of the room. A number of people are here with empty jugs, waiting their turn at the cask spigot.
